snippet: McCRACKEN--Jeanne M. S.,September 8, 1920 - February 3, 2016. Scottish parents Jean T. and Sylvester Smith. Predeceased by her husband John E. McCracken. Survived by her beloved niece Barbara Wilman (John) and nephew Rev. Robert T. Smith (Garey- Lea), three grandnieces and three great-grandnephews. Educated at the New York College of Music. Served in the American Red Cross in France 1945. Worked at Rockefeller Family & Associates, 1948-2002. Member of Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church and a former Trustee. Member of the Cosmopolitan Club. Loved music, theater, films, ballets, reading, cooking, and hats. Memorial service to be held in the spring at Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church, (date to be announced). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCCRACKEN, JEANNE M. S.
